title: Small Steps
description: Ben Amann currently hates The accident that temporarily put him in a wheelchair, the fact that he has to go for rehab and live in an assisted living home as well. Sebastian Hofers, the good looking but equally bad-tempered new assistant to his rehab therapist changes that.Sebastian has two choices after causing an accident while driving community service hours or go to jail. The decision is a no-brainer, and so he meets Ben at the rehab center. author: Chris McHart
